mapper.select:
SELECT sys_id, order_no, reference_no, order_cates, user_id, cellphone_no, order_time, total_qty, status, remark, parent_no, user_channel, is_deleted, creationtime FROM order_main
AND user_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{params.userId}, '%')

SELECT om.sys_id sysId, om.order_no orderNo, om.order_time orderTime, ur.relative_name customerName,
epm.package_name packageName, oex.exam_master_item examMasterItem, oai.appointment_cates appointmentCates, oai.option_1 option_1, om.parent_no parentNo, om.status
FROM order_main om LEFT JOIN order_additional_info oai ON oai.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN order_customer oc ON oc.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN user_relatives ur ON ur.relative_id = oc.relative_id LEFT JOIN exam_package_main epm ON epm.sys_id = om.reference_no LEFT JOIN order_extension_exam oex ON oex.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN order_payment op ON op.order_no = om.order_no WHERE 1=1 AND om.is_deleted = 0
AND om.status = #{params.status}

SELECT om.sys_id sysId, om.order_no orderNo, epm.package_name packageName, epm.subtitle, epm.content, ea.service_name serviceName, epa.periods, ea.cates, oai.amount, em.name emName, ed.item_name itemName, oee.exam_master_item examMasterItem, ub.full_name fullName, om.total_qty totalQty, ur.relative_name customerName FROM order_main om LEFT JOIN exam_package_main epm ON epm.sys_id = om.reference_no LEFT JOIN exam_package_append epa ON epm.sys_id = epa.package_main_id LEFT JOIN exam_append ea ON ea.sys_id = epa.append_id LEFT JOIN exam_package_detail epd ON epd.exam_main_id = epm.sys_id LEFT JOIN exam_master em ON em.sys_id = epd.exam_master_id LEFT JOIN exam_detail ed ON ed.sys_id = epd.exam_detail_id LEFT JOIN order_additional_info oai ON oai.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN order_extension_exam oee ON oee.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN user_basic ub ON ub.user_id = om.user_id LEFT JOIN order_customer oc ON oc.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN user_relatives ur ON ur.relative_id = oc.relative_id WHERE 1=1 AND om.is_deleted = 0
AND om.sys_id = #{params.sysId}

SELECT om.sys_id sysId, om.order_no orderNo, oee.exam_master_item examMasterItem, om.status, ur.relative_name customerName, ur.id_card_no idNo, ur.gender, ur.cellphone_no cellphoneNo1, uc.card_cates cardCates, uc.card_no cardNo, si.name siName, oa.time_from timeFrom, oa.time_to timeTo, om.order_time orderTime, om.user_channel userChannel, oai.amount FROM order_main om LEFT JOIN order_extension_exam oee ON oee.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN order_customer oc ON oc.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN user_relatives ur ON ur.relative_id = oc.relative_id LEFT JOIN order_appointment oa ON oa.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN order_additional_info oai ON oai.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN sys_institution si ON si.institution_id = oa.institution_id LEFT JOIN user_cards uc ON om.user_id = uc.user_id WHERE 1=1 AND om.is_deleted = 0
AND om.sys_id = #{params.sysId}

SELECT om.sys_id sysId, om.order_no orderNo, oee.exam_master_item examMasterItem, om.status, ur.relative_name customerName, ur.id_card_no idNo, ur.gender, ur.cellphone_no cellphoneNo1, uc.card_cates cardCates, uc.card_no cardNo, si.name siName, oa.time_from timeFrom, oa.time_to timeTo, om.order_time orderTime, om.user_channel userChannel, oai.amount, sd.department_name departmentName FROM order_main om LEFT JOIN order_extension_exam oee ON oee.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN order_customer oc ON oc.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN user_relatives ur ON ur.relative_id = oc.relative_id LEFT JOIN order_appointment oa ON oa.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN order_additional_info oai ON oai.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN sys_institution si ON si.institution_id = oa.institution_id LEFT JOIN user_cards uc ON om.user_id = uc.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_department sd ON sd.sys_id = oa.department_id WHERE 1=1 AND om.is_deleted = 0
AND om.sys_id = #{params.sysId}

FROM order_main WHERE order_no = #{orderNo} LIMIT 1

select order_no from order_main where status = 2
AND reference_no = #{params.referenceNo}
SELECT od.rest_count FROM order_main om LEFT JOIN order_detail od on om.order_no = od.order_no WHERE om.user_id = #{params.userId} and od.append_id = 2 and od.rest_count is not NULL

SELECT oa.address, oa.appointment_cates, oa.appoint_date, oa.institution_id, oa.related_no, oa.order_no, oai.option_1, oa.time_from, oa.`status` appointment_status, om.order_cates, om.reference_no, om.`status` pay_status, om.user_id, oa.entity_id, epm.package_name FROM order_appointment oa LEFT JOIN order_main om on oa.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN order_additional_info oai on oai.order_no = oa.order_no LEFT JOIN exam_package_main epm on epm.sys_id = om.reference_no WHERE oa.appointment_cates = 3 and oa.user_id = #{params.userId} and oa.is_cancelled = 0 and om.is_deleted = 0

SELECT oa.address, oa.appointment_cates, oa.appoint_date, oa.department_id, oa.entity_id, oa.institution_id, oa.`status` appointment_status, oa.order_no, oa.related_no, oa.service_option, oai.option_1, oa.time_from, oa.user_id, om.order_cates, om.parent_no, om.`status` pay_status, ed.item_name, em.`name` FROM order_appointment oa LEFT JOIN order_main om on oa.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN order_additional_info oai on oai.order_no = oa.order_no LEFT JOIN order_extension_exam oee on oee.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN exam_master em on em.sys_id = oee.exam_master_id LEFT JOIN exam_detail ed on ed.sys_id = oee.exam_detail_id where oa.user_id = #{params.userId} and (oa.appointment_cates = 2 or oa.appointment_cates = 4) and om.is_deleted = 0 and oa.is_cancelled = 0

SELECT oa.address, oa.appointment_cates, oa.appoint_date, oa.department_id, oa.entity_id, oa.institution_id, oa.order_no, oa.related_no, oa.service_option, oai.option_1, oa.time_from, oa.user_id, om.order_cates, om.parent_no, om.reference_no, oa.`status` appointment_status, om.`status` pay_status, epm.package_name FROM order_appointment oa LEFT JOIN order_main om on oa.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN order_additional_info oai on oai.order_no = oa.order_no LEFT JOIN exam_package_main epm on epm.sys_id = om.reference_no where om.parent_no = #{params.parentNo} and (oa.appointment_cates = 2 or oa.appointment_cates = 4) and om.is_deleted = 0 and oa.is_cancelled = 0
